title: Top Calisthenics Gyms in Delhi
summary: Discover Delhi's premier calisthenics parks where you can push your limits, enhance your fitness, and join a thriving community of enthusiasts.

body.raw:
# Top Calisthenics Gyms in Delhi
Embark on an exhilarating fitness journey in Delhi, where the rich cultural heritage meets a burgeoning calisthenics scene. If you're eager to sculpt your body, sweat it out, and become part of a dynamic fitness community, Delhi is the place to be. Discover the best calisthenics parks in the city, offering a perfect blend of historical charm and modern fitness amenities. Whether you're a newcomer or a seasoned calisthenics enthusiast, Delhi's parks provide the ideal setting to push your boundaries and achieve your fitness goals. Join the movement and embrace a new way of fitness in the vibrant capital city of India. ## 1. **Workout Warriors Calisthenics Academy**
**Location**: [Bhalswa Jahangir Village](https://maps.app.goo.gl/GxYq7VuHtV8oDUP9A) **About**: Workout Warriors Calisthenics Academy provides a dedicated space for calisthenics enthusiasts in Delhi to train and improve their skills. **Instagram**: [Workout Warriors Calisthenics Academy](https://www.instagram.com/workout_warriors_official/) ## 2. **AlphaPack Calisthenics Academy**
**Location**: [Vikaspuri](https://maps.app.goo.gl/3578q9ejzFLjrnau5) **About**: AlphaPack Calisthenics Academy is Delhi's first official Calisthenics Centre, offering a specialized environment for bodyweight training and skill development. **Instagram**: [AlphaPack Calisthenics Academy](https://www.instagram.com/alphapack.academy/) ## 3. **Indian Calisthenics Academy**
**Location**: [Dwarka](https://maps.app.goo.gl/xbDgr9t8krp3RyFR6) **About**: Indian Calisthenics Academy was founded by Siddharth Tyagi, Winner of Calisthenics World Cup 2019 (South Africa). It aims to create awareness about calisthenics as a way to a fit and healthy lifestyle. The academy also supports young and passionate athletes in reaching their goals and ambitions. **Website**: [Indian Calisthenics Academy](https://www.indiancalisthenicsacademy.in/) **Instagram**: [Indian Calisthenics Academy](https://www.instagram.com/indian_calisthenics_academy/) ## 4. **Permafly**
**Location**: [Shahdara](https://maps.app.goo.gl/4TTYjkgABGYVK3ZZ6) **About**: PERMAFLY is a pioneer Calisthenic, Gymnastics, Parkour and Yoga academy in India. It's the first Calisthenics academy established in Delhi. PERMAFLY is based on a new concept of maneuver pattern, designed by Team PERMAFLY to help you achieve your ultimate fitness level. **Website**: [Permafly](https://www.permafly.in/) **Instagram**: [Permafly](https://www.instagram.com/permaflydelhi/)
